ygData.subject: Re: Off to vacation - Poor Mantella
ygData.msgSnippet: Mantella Mantella: So, Shredder, how abo- *Mantella stops as she looks to her side and doesn t see Shredder. She frowns and sighs* *She looks around herself

Subject: Re: Off to vacation - Poor Mantella

From: "ilovealllizards" <ilovealllizards@...>

Mantella


Mantella: "So, Shredder, how abo-"

*Mantella stops as she looks to her side and doesn't see Shredder. She
frowns and sighs*

*She looks around herself and relizes that she's all alone. She lowers her
head and tear falls out of her optic. She raises her head and looks around
once more. She figures she just a boring crummy bot no matter what team she
joins. She wishes she had a relationship or at least a partnership. She
starts walking and hears movement in a bush and looks behind herself to what
it was. It was only a racoon but she's not watching where she's going and
trips over a root and falls down a hill near by*

*She gets her arms slashed, her legs cut, wires pulled, rocks hitting her
till finally she rolls to the end and lays there shaking in pain. She goes
into stasis lock and out and in and out and in and than out*

*She looks herself over and see's sticks and sharp rocks sticking through
her. She just lays there shaking in pain. She closes her optics and lays
there hoping someone would see her*

*Than she thinks about her Commlink. She smiles and than frowns when she
looks at the dented smashed piece of metal that was once her Commlink. She
frowns closes her optics*

----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 2:34 PM
Subject: Off to Vacation


> Allright, I'm off. I forgot to mention yesterday that JP gets controll of
> Autofire, and KSL also gets controll of DevilDuer till I get back. C ya
all
> in 10 days, or if I get on a comp before that.
>
> ::Zardus/Prowl/DevilDuer/Ramulus/DeathScythe/Mosquitor/Shredder::
>
> Zardus leans back from the femm he had been reprogramming, his arm
starting
> to shimmer. It was happening again, he could feel it. He frowns, turning
back
> and typing a few commands on a console. A stasis field emerges over the
femm,
> keeping her in stasis untill a command from him would disable it. He
> activates his comm-link on a secure channel to all Alliance members other
> than Feline and Skulletron, who were in the Cybertronian Fire.
>
> "Everyone," he says into it, "I'll be gone for a few days. Nemesis
Enforcer
> is in charge untill I return. Feline and Skulletron will return soon
wearing
> Maximal symbols, don't open fire. They'll have interesting information."
>
> With a flash, Zardus dissapears, to return in a few days.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Prowl blinks, looking down at himself as he turns partly transparent.
Prowl
> looks back at Iron Raptor. He was reluctant to leave her, but he had no
real
> choice.
>
> "I'll be back in a few days, love," he says to her, quickly kissing her
> before he dissapears.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> In front of the pod, DevilDuer looks at the new bot. "Hello, I'm
DevilDuer,"
> he says to the bot, "Who are you?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus frowns as his feet pass through a bush, noticing that he was
> shimmering. He sighs. Here it comes again. With a flash, he dissapears, as
> does DeathScythe above.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Without warning, Mosquitor's stupidity causes him to be phazed out from
the
> dimention for a few days to fix some bugs with his brain and make him at
> least be able to solve 2 + 2.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Walking alongside Mantella, Shredder suddenly falls to his knees, starting
to
> shimmer. He groans as he dissapears with a flash. He hated these small
> phazings, but they were unavoidable.
>
> 
>
>
>
